remarks: The only multiples of ` A ` that are equal to the identity are the multiples of the order of ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Sep-2015.)
statement:
odcl.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odcl.2 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
odid.3 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
odid.4 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
oddvdsnn0 $p |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ A e. X /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( ( O ` A ) || N <-> ( N .x. A ) = .0. ) ) $.
